newsitem.title: DUBAI: HORSE RACING-RESCHEDULED DUBAI WORLD CUP TIME CHANGED.
newsitem.headline: HORSE RACING-RESCHEDULED DUBAI WORLD CUP TIME CHANGED.

text.p: The rain-delayed running of the Dubai World Cup horse race will take place at 7:35 pm (1535 GMT) on Thursday, organisers said on Tuesday.
The $4 million race, the world's richest for thoroughbreds, was postponed on Saturday when a two-hour thunderstorm and flash floods deluged the sand track.
Organisers had said afterwards the race would be run at 8:15 pm (1615 GMT) on Thursday.
